channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3023] Police Chief Gets Pwned by Marijuana Advocate
item.description: Scott Kirkland is the Chief of the El Cerrito Police Department. Watch as he gets pwned by Richard Lee, co-owner of Hemp Research Company and marijuana advocate for 17 years.

item.title: [+2449] Flat Screen TV Fail
[+2396] Jon Stewart Owns Glenn Beck on Healthcare Hypocrisy (Video)
item.description: If you're like me, you woke up this morning to find the sun rising in the west against a green sky, you got out of your bed on the ceiling, took a fresh breath of carbon dioxide, thought about how repulsive puppies are and said to yourself, Glenn Beck is not at all a hypocritical lunatic. But if you don't live in Oppositeville, here's what you saw.

item.title: [+2193] Brad Pitt for Mayor: I'm Running on Legalize Pot Platform
item.description: Brad Pitt, are you running for Mayor of New Orleans? "Yeah, I'm running on the gay marriage, no religion, legalization and taxation of marijuana platform. I have no chance."

item.title: [+1585] How Popular Website Designs Looked Like In Late 90's
item.description: Few months ago, we have posted about 27 Eye-Opening and Inspiring Websites Of Top Brands that would be useful to understand the current design trends followed by the top brands. Our this post would be fun to see and interesting to explore few of the todayâ€™s top website designs before a decade.

item.title: [+1518] State Farm Pulls Glenn Beck Support
[+1451] Wake them up or let them sleep? [Pic]
[+1164] Your odds of dying in a plane crash.
[+1001] Tarantino Terrorized Sleeping Basterd Actors w/ Giant Dildo
item.description: Apparently there was a running joke on the set of Inglourious Basterds, whereby if a castmember was caught sleeping, they would get their picture taken with a giant purple dildo, and that giant purple dildo was named Gerry.

item.title: [+985] Digsby Joins the Dark Side, Uses Your PC to Make Money
item.description: TheDigsby instant messenger client not only bundles half a dozen "optional" crapware applications, i's also using your computer to crawl the web, do stock market research, and more. It's time to uninstall.

item.title: [+962] Comedy Central Cancels "Reno 911"
item.description: "Reno 911! was canceled at 1:30 pm today," the show's co-creator/star Thomas Lennon wrote on his Twitter feed Thursday afternoon. "Won't be wearing the shorts again."

item.title: [+878] 8 Classic Board Games That Destroy Friendships
item.description: All too many board game experiences end with wrench, a candlestick and a body, and none of you have been playing Clue.

item.title: [+847] 5yr Old Girl Teaches You How to Fish Like a Man
[+845] 3 x (Keyboard-Cat-Moon shirt + Digg Employee + Dog)!!!
item.description: Yeah.... this might just be the greatest picture in the HISTORY OF THE INTERNET!!!

item.title: [+818] 50 Amazing Ramen Noodle Recipes
item.description: Going to college requires a lot of your time, which doesn't allow you to cook your common four-course meal. Using the age-old college fallback, ramen noodles, you can cook yourself a tasty treat in a short amount of time without breaking the bank.

item.title: [+797] New Image of Mars Show Half-Mile Wide Crater Complete [PICS]
item.description: It is one of the most dramatic images to emerge from Mars. The photograph is so clear even sand dunes at the base of the canyon are visible.

item.title: [+762] Internal Memo Confirms Big Giveaways In Deal With Big Pharna
item.description: A memo obtained by the Huffington Post confirms that the White House and the pharmaceutical lobby secretly agreed to precisely the sort of wide-ranging deal that both parties have been denying over the past week.

item.title: [+666] Microsoft Disputes Firefox One Billion Downloads
item.description: Two weeks ago, Mozilla announced a major milestone for its Firefox (Firefox) web browser: one billion downloads. They even launched OneBillionPlusYou.com to mark the occasion and demonstrate just how large one billion really is.

item.title: [+666] 20 Beautiful Examples of Urban Decay Photography (Images)
item.description: Urban Decay photography is the technique of photographing abandoned and rundown buildings - check out these 20 great examples!

item.title: [+655] Highway Condom Explosion
